body:
In muslim countries, women are commodity.
According to Sultan Brunai, Men can rape their foreign maid, especially the maid from the neighbors muslim countries without repercussion since those women are considered slave. Sultan said, according to prophet, raping slave is halal since prophet and his gang were known to rape infidel left and right, especially the younger one  while in japan, women have the same right with men and treated as equal.
What happened in the hentai and jav is just artist/director's imagination to sate the horny kids around the world include muslim countries.
Subhanallah,  happy faping while pretend it's as halal as raping your maid fellow mujahid.
Damn... I hope no one uproaded this to the WIRED network. Would be a shame.
in Muslim countries women have their own train carts. In Japan, not so much.
